title: Panel, late 19th - early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace, ground with loop & twist with twist return
description: Needle lace rectangle with a central panel containing two confronted full-face lions facing a central vine-like tree. The scrolls of the tree enclose birds, leaves and two rabbits. Continuous outer border of an open twist framing small rosettes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, late 19th - early 20th century.Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace, ground with loop & twist with twist return. 1971-83-2.
